name: trapdoor
look_description: Above you is a beat-up hatch door. It's made of wood and has an iron handle nailed to one side. You try to open it, but you can't quite reach the handle. It's a pity because you are so close.

touch.text: The door is out of reach.

smell.text: The door is too far away to smell.

open.text: The door is out of reach.

jump.text: You jump for it but the door is still out of reach.
